response.original_title: Man Jailed For Painting Zoo Animals Orange
response.overview: Video mixtape, second title in the "Artpig Trilogy". Title seems to come from a short Weekly World News article, from the May 25, 1993 edition.
response.title: Man Jailed For Painting Zoo Animals Orange

release_dates.note: I don't think the actual release date is out there but it came out 1993 on videotape
